testsuite.name: Scenario: Bother the user with Upgrade message once a day

testcase.name: Given the internet is reachable
testcase.classname: Scenario: Bother the user with Upgrade message once a day

testcase.name: Given an outdated initialised environment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Bother the user with Upgrade message once a day

testcase.name: And the system is bootstrapped
testcase.classname: Scenario: Bother the user with Upgrade message once a day

testcase.name: When I enter "sdk help" and answer "N"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Bother the user with Upgrade message once a day

testcase.name: Then I see "A new version of SDKMAN is available..."
testcase.classname: Scenario: Bother the user with Upgrade message once a day

testcase.name: And I see "Would you like to upgrade now? (Y/n)"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Bother the user with Upgrade message once a day

testcase.name: And I see "Not upgrading today..."
testcase.classname: Scenario: Bother the user with Upgrade message once a day

testcase.name: And I enter "sdk help"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Bother the user with Upgrade message once a day

testcase.name: Then I do not see "A new version of SDKMAN is available..."
testcase.classname: Scenario: Bother the user with Upgrade message once a day

testcase.name: And I do not see "Would you like to upgrade now? (Y/n)"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Bother the user with Upgrade message once a day

testcase.name: And I do not see "Not upgrading now..."
testcase.classname: Scenario: Bother the user with Upgrade message once a day

testcase.name: And I do not see "Successfully upgraded SDKMAN."
testcase.classname: Scenario: Bother the user with Upgrade message once a day

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Bother the user with Upgrade message once a day
